original_text: Therefore the redeemed of the Lord shall return, and come with singing unto Zion; and everlasting joy shall be upon their head: they shall obtain gladness and joy; and sorrow and mourning shall flee away.
korean_text: 여호와께 구속 받은 자들이 돌아와 노래하며 시온으로 돌아오니 영원한 기쁨이 그들의 머리 위에 있고 슬픔과 탄식이 달아나리이다

sentences.original_text: Therefore the redeemed of the Lord shall return
and come with singing unto Zion
and everlasting joy shall be upon their head
they shall obtain gladness and joy
and sorrow and mourning shall flee away
